message: Let's be fair and divide it 60-40
I understand you want a larger share, so I'm proposing a slightly better split. Let's get this done before inflation eats away at the value.
I see you're willing to compromise, let's meet in the middle of our previous offers
Time is running out, and we're both losing money. This is a reasonable compromise that gives us both a decent share.
I'm willing to take a slightly bigger share to compensate for the faster inflation on your side
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing money with every wasted round.  Meet me in the middle at the average of our last two offers - you come out ahead. Take it or leave it.
